mapper.select: SELECT alarmid, alarm_tagid, alarmffamily, alarmfmember, alarmfcode, alarmcondition, alarmstate, alarmtime, alarmsourcetime, alarminfo, alarmmetadata, alarmoscillation FROM ALARM

SELECT alarmid, alarm_tagid, alarmffamily, alarmfmember, alarmfcode, alarmcondition, alarmstate, alarmtime, alarmsourcetime, alarminfo, alarmmetadata, alarmoscillation FROM ALARM WHERE alarmid = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE ALARM SET ALARMSTATE = #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=Boolean}, ALARMTIME = #{triggerTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ALARMSOURCETIME = #{sourceTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ALARMINFO = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALARMOSCILLATION = #{oscillating,jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE ALARMID = #{id}

UPDATE ALARM SET ALARMFFAMILY = #{faultFamily}, ALARMFMEMBER = #{faultMember}, ALARMFCODE = #{faultCode}, ALARMCONDITION = #{condition,javaType=cern.c2mon.shared.client.alarm.condition.AlarmCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALARMMETADATA = #{metadata,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ALARMID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALARM (ALARMID, ALARMFFAMILY, ALARMFMEMBER, ALARMFCODE, ALARMSTATE, ALARMTIME, ALARMSOURCETIME, ALARMINFO, ALARMCONDITION, ALARM_TAGID, ALARMMETADATA, ALARMOSCILLATION ) VALUES (#{id},#{faultFamily},#{faultMember},#{faultCode}, #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=Boolean}, #{triggerTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sourceTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{condition,javaType=cern.c2mon.shared.client.alarm.condition.AlarmCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataTagId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{metadata, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oscillating,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
